name: Cat Lady (itch)
description:
In this game, made for Ludum Dare 40, you get to play a cat lady, taking care of more and more cats as time goes by.  Can you take care of dozens of cats, keeping your house clean enough to keep the authorities away?  Try my game and find out!

Participating in Ludum Dare?  Wanna vote/comment on my game?  Expand the more info section below and click on the Ludum Dare link.
